title: IFFI To Host India’s First-Ever AI Film Festival And Hackathon In Goa From THIS Date - Details Inside
description: India’s International Film Festival (IFFI) will debut the country’s first AI Film Festival and Hackathon in Goa from November 20–28 to explore the future of storytelling through artificial intelligence.
content:
Goa: The International Film Festival of India (IFFI) will launch the country's first Artificial Intelligence (AI) Film Festival and Hackathon in Goa.

title: AI algorithm paired with ECG sensors can accurately detect structural heart diseases
description: An artificial intelligence (AI) algorithm paired with the single-lead electrocardiogram (ECG) sensors on a smartwatch accurately diagnosed structural heart diseases, such as weakened pumping ability, damaged valves or thickened heart muscle, according to a preliminary study to be presented at the American Heart Association's Scientific Sessions 2025.

title: Artificial intelligence reveals how a human could live to 140
description: Someone recently asked artificial intelligence if it would be possible to live until 140 – and there's a lot to learn from its answer.
content:

title: LinkedIn: From today it uses user data in the EU to train artificial intelligence models
description: It will use posts, articles, replies and biographies to "feed genetic artificial intelligence"
content:
